title: War risk and piracy insurance certificates
dataVerified: Vessel owner, vessel IMO, covered war zones, piracy areas, premium, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake war risk certificates. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate. High-risk areas (Gulf of Aden, Strait of Hormuz). Separate from standard hull coverage. Time-sensitive voyage-specific coverage. Joint War Committee (JWC) listed areas.
